Title: Permutations II
Description:
A permutation of integers 1,2,\ldots,n is called beautiful if there are no adjacent elements whose difference is 1. 
 Given n, your task is to count the number of beautiful permutations.
Input Specification: The only input line contains an integer n.
Output Specification: Print the number of beautiful permutations of 1,2,\ldots,n modulo 10^9+7.
